attributes.comment:
I would like to express my dismay and concern regarding the proposed increase in
fees for prospective adoptive parents. My husband and I have been in the
process of adopting a child from China since July 2005. We have completed the
required paperwork and fingerprinting twice and have paid the corresponding fees
twice. The proposed fee increase places an unfair burden on law-abiding, tax
paying citizens who are trying to adopt a child. Please reconsider an increase
in fees that will penalize those of us who are trying to follow the rules and
who simply want to become parents.

Thank you.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Theresa Ehntholt
